website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Transformer Pad TF701 Android tablet combines a stunning display and impressive performance, but its productivity pitch loses out to more capable and even cheaper Windows alternatives available.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good quality as the TF101
customer_reviews.text: I had the very first of these the TF101 and that was the dogs dangly bits! :-) I was dissapointed with this however. Although it is slimmer and lighter and supposed to be much faster than the other one, I found that it seemed very FLIMSY! I have also some concerns about the screen. There seems to be slight gaps at the edges where it seems to not be properly joined. There a number of posts on the web about random screen cracks. I suspects it is due the flex described above. Don't get me wrong I love this product, but it is let down by the build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nobby

customer_reviews.title: The faster processor and extra RAM really transform this "transformer" ...
customer_reviews.text: The faster processor and extra RAM really transform this "transformer" after the tf700t. Stuff just happens without the lag of the previous model. The extra battery in the keyboard helps out if you are away from power point. On my long distance walks such as Offa's Dyke trail, the SD card slot in the keyboard takes the card from my camera and allows me to back up and review the days pix. At less than £300 it is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Delamare

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: great tab,, few quirks,, but much better than previous prime model... A little big and heavy compared to most tabs,, but great as mini laptop at home or work,,, will use my galaxy 7.7 for plane train and holidays... Dont think this pads ment to travel to well,, lots of memory ,,, managed to get 64 gig micro sd card to work,,, tried about 4 samsung sony,, sandisk etc, ,but none worked, ,,, kinston worked fine... So now happy... Screen res great.... But not really needed... Battery life much not great, , but will sufice...
customer_reviews.author: david easter

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant device! So pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Such a brilliant tablet. researched into the and this was one of the best specification tablets with a keyboard on the market and very good build quality and many updates to firmware and the Asus apps. The later models of this tablet were cheaper in price and quality and the spec and screen quality was reduced. I am very happy with this and the quality is awesome. So happy I finally got an Android tablet now.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: ... much time to explore all the features of this brilliant little device as I would've liked
customer_reviews.text: I've been extremely busy so haven't had as much time to explore all the features of this brilliant little device as I would've liked, but I'm very happy with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go
customer_reviews.text: A large tablet and a tiny laptop. Has transformed my working day. Great on the go. Great to get any app. Does most officey based tasks. Also great for me as a teacher, I can link into school sims, take photos of work, share with students. Now looking for markbook. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nicola L Hirst

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a TF300T. No comparison. Never pauses, ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a TF300T. No comparison. Never pauses, lags or asks if I want to close anything. Different class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: SCREEN CRACKED, NOT COVERED UNDER GUARANTEE.COST OF REPAIR TOO EXPENSIVE. PRODUCT IS TOO FRAGILE
customer_reviews.author: Derek K.

customer_reviews.title: brilliant, great buy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenage daughter, she can anything on this homework too. Very pleased with it. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: michelle ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. Bought it as a birthday present for my son. Good deal as it included the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a laptop at home. The TEGRA 4 ARM CPU is very fast, and the ultra hi-res screen and good keyboard work well.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Streater

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tablet as described, it does upgrade to android kit kat. i recomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Eugenio Fernandes Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Good compromise
customer_reviews.text: It's a good compromise between the laptop and the tablet. The dock station is perfect with the USB 3.0, the SD card that can be add, the keyboard fit well and have a good response. The screen is easy to use, micro SD can be add. It's a good product when is fully working because it's the second one that I order as the first dock station was not charging but Amazon Changed it without any problem..
customer_reviews.author: RAGUENES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nive little unit that can be split down to a 10 inch tablet
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews on the docking station!
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is brilliant. Absolutely top notch. Unfortunately, the docking station this comes with is disgraceful. Asus really need to do a product recall on this. I had the docking station for a week before the connection to the tablet broke. It now no longer communicates with the tablet or charges it. To say i am disappointed would be an understatement. I am currently negotiating with Amazon on a return. Please do not buy. You will be disappointed after a couple of weeks when the shoddy docking station fails.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gennard

customer_reviews.title: positive and negative
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a few days ago come very quickly 5 stars display very good 5 stars keyboard works very well there are plus-points but there are many negative battery does not hold much light on the display is turned off automatic change other I personally am not happy I have 4 ipad 1 years he never even makes the problem
customer_reviews.author: rombos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - in for repair after 2 months. ASUS won't offer a replacement
customer_reviews.text: The screen has developed a fault - when opened in the dock, a "smudge" appears, shrinks to a point and disappears with a quiet but audible "pop". The digitizer is then partially unresponsive. I was told to do a factory reset to cure it! Well, guess what - that had no effect. They won't replace it, but insist on repair instead. The hinge is also quite wobbly, but so was my old TF101 and it didn't give me any trouble. I've been a loyal ASUS customer for years, Their offhand attitude to a clear manufacturing defect mean I won't be buying from ASUS again and I won't be recommending this otherwise excellent tablet to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good allround Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my partner but I get to use it as well. Good functionality and nice clear and crisp display. Screen colours are good and the unit is very responsive and light to handle.
customer_reviews.author: CLAIRE F

product_meta.title: ASUS Transformer TF701T 10.1 inch Tablet with Keyboard Dock (Black) - (Nvidia Tegra 4 1.9GHz Processor, 2GB RAM, 32GB eMMC, WLAN, BT, 2x Camera, Android 4.2)
product_meta.description:
ASUS TRANSFORMER PAD (TF701T)
AT A GLANCE
 *  2,560 x 1,600 300ppi ultra high resolution 
 *  NVIDIA Tegra 4 Quad-core ARM Coretex-A15 with 72 Core GeForce GPU 
 *  USB 3.0 provides up to 10 times faster data transfers 
 *  Supreme sound with SonicMaster technology 
 *  Support Wi-Fi 802.11a/b/g/n and Miracast
 *  Battery life up to 17 hours (pad and docking) 

HIGH-PERFORMANCE LAPTOP AND LIGHTWEIGHT TABLET COMBINED
Asus Transformer Pad T1701T is extremely compact and ultra-portable for people who want the productivity features of a laptop with the easy portability of a tablet -- and the flexibility to switch between the two in an instant.

Transformer Pad features a NVIDIA Tegra 4 quad-core ARM Coretex-A15 with 72 Core GeForce GPU for smooth multi-tasking performance and incredible energy efficiency, and lasts for up to 17 hours on battery power. The lightweight keyboard dock features precision-engineered keys designed for comfortable extended use, plus a multi-touch touchpad with full Windows 8.1 gesture support.

Just 10.5mm thin in tablet mode, Transformer Pad’s 10.1-inch display has a crisp 2,560 x 1,600 resolution and features IPS technology for wide 178-degree viewing angles with daylight visibility. Capacitive multi-touch gives fine fingertip control in tablet mode, while Asus' Reading Mode technology adjusts the display automatically to make the screen easier to read for long periods.

ASUS INSTANT ON AND SONICMASTER AUDIO TECHNOLOGY
Transformer Pad also features Asus Instant On technology for the kind of instant response that people have come to expect from tablets. Transformer Pad wakes from standby in an instant and lasts for up to 14 days in standby mode.

Asus SonicMaster audio technology gives true-to-life sound, and Transformer Pad also features USB 3.0, 802.11a/b/g/n dual-band Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 4.0.




LEGAL DISCLAIMER
Item comes with damaged packaging. No actual damage or usage of unit and is sold as new.

BOX CONTAINS
ASUS Tablet
Keyboard Dock
Power Adapter
User Documentation/Media

See more
